biography: Daniel Myrick (born November 30, 1962) is an American director most famous for writing and directing the 1999 microbudget blockbuster "The Blair Witch Project" alongside Eduardo SÃ¡nchez. Since then he has gone on to direct numerous other horror movies, including "Solstice" (2008), "The Objective" (2008) and "Skyman" (2020).
name: Daniel Myrick
